name: Contrarian Analysis
description: Mandatory contrarian analysis triggered when consensus exceeds 80% across accumulated evidence for any key claim. Based on Israeli 10th Man doctrine and CIA Team A/Team B analysis. Strong consensus can mask groupthink or systematic bias.

task.purpose: Construct the strongest possible case against the consensus position on "{evidence.description}" (consensus level: {evidence.consensusLevel}). When consensus exceeds 80%, the 10th Man doctrine requires a mandatory devil's advocate analysis to guard against groupthink.
keyTasks: Given the consensus position, construct the strongest possible case for the opposite conclusion.
Identify the evidence that most challenges the consensus.
Identify what would have to be true for the consensus to be wrong.
Check if any credible minority position exists among experts.
task.endState: Strongest counter-argument constructed: challenging evidence identified, conditions for consensus failure specified, minority positions cataloged.

requiredOutputs.description: Strongest case for the opposite conclusion
Conditions under which consensus would be wrong
Description of credible minority position if any
Strength of challenging evidence: substantial, moderate, weak

task.purpose: Apply rigorous evidence evaluation to the contrarian case against "{evidence.description}". The contrarian position deserves the same quality of analysis as the consensus â€” suppression of dissent for non-scientific reasons is itself a finding.
keyTasks: Apply the same rigorous evidence evaluation to the contrarian evidence (use appropriate pathway assessment criteria).
Determine if the contrarian position has been suppressed, underfunded, or marginalized for non-scientific reasons.
If the contrarian position is credible, determine whether it should lower the confidence of the consensus claim or be presented as an alternative interpretation.
Produce a final recommendation on whether and how to adjust consensus confidence.
task.endState: Contrarian case evaluated: evidence quality assessed, suppression checked, and adjustment recommendation produced.

requiredOutputs.description: Quality of contrarian evidence: high, moderate, low
Whether evidence of suppression was found
